name: beads
description: 分布式Git支持的图形问题追踪工具，为AI代理提供编码任务的持久化结构化记忆
innovations: Hash-based ID system preventing merge conflicts in distributed workflows
Version-controlled database (Dolt) enabling time-travel queries and branching
Git-native distribution eliminating need for central servers
Semantic memory compression using LLMs (Claude Haiku) for closed issues
JSONL-based synchronization compatible with line-level Git merge strategies

use_cases.name: AI Coding Agent Memory
use_cases.description: Persistent structured memory for long-running coding agents to maintain context across sessions without losing task dependencies

use_cases.name: Distributed Team Task Management
use_cases.description: Decentralized issue tracking for teams across multiple locations with automatic conflict resolution via Git

use_cases.name: Long-term Project Planning
use_cases.description: Maintain project memory and knowledge graphs without data loss, supporting complex dependency relationships

use_cases.name: Multi-Agent Coordination
use_cases.description: Enable multiple AI agents to work on the same project with automatic dependency discovery and task decomposition

value_propositions.name: Git原生分布式记忆
value_propositions.description: 通过Hash-based ID系统防止合并冲突和版本控制数据库(Dolt)实现时间旅行查询和分支管理,采用Git原生分发消除中心服务器依赖,支持离线优先和零冲突合并设计,为AI编码代理提供持久化结构化记忆。

value_propositions.name: 语义压缩与依赖追踪
value_propositions.description: 采用LLM(Claude Haiku)语义记忆压缩技术处理已关闭问题,结合依赖感知图实现多代理协作协调,通过JSONL同步兼容行级Git合并策略,支持完整审计追踪和依赖可视化。
